Class-Alchemist 20 -- Female Skilled Heritage Human Alchemist: 20

Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14

Alchemical Alacrity: Increased Quick Alchemy effects
Alchemist Skills: Skill Trained (Crafting; Choose 8 from any)
Alertness: Perception Expert

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Cavern Lore): Skill Trained (Cavern Lore)
Skill Training (Demon Lore): Skill Trained (Demon Lore)
Skill Training (Engineering Lore): Skill Trained (Engineering Lore)

Skill Training (Medicine): Skill Trained (Medicine)
Skill Training (Milling Lore): Skill Trained (Milling Lore)
Skilled Heritage Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Advanced Alchemy: May use a batch of infused reagents to create a pair of infused alchemical items of up to level 20 without a Crafting check
Alchemical Crafting: May use Crafting to create alchemical items/Knows formulas for four common 1st-level alchemical items
Alchemical Savant: May use Crafting to Identify Alchemy as a single action/+2 to Identify known formulas; critical failures on known formulas are normal failures
Chirurgeon: May use Crafting in place of Medicine
Clever Improviser: May use any skill untrained
Combine Elixirs: (F) May create a single elixir that has the effects of two elixirs of up to level 18
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures when using Aid with expert skills are successes
Craft Philosopher's Stone: Knows the formula for creating a philosopher's stone
Efficient Alchemy: May produce twice the usual number of alchemical items during downtime
Elastic Mutagen: Consuming a quicksilver mutagen allows 10' Steps and moving through tight spaces as 1 size smaller
Enduring Alchemy: Quick Alchemy products last until the end of next turn
Eternal Elixir: May extend indefinitely the duration of an elixir of up to level 10
Extend Elixir: Doubles elixir duration
Feral Mutagen: Consuming a bestial mutagen adds item bonus to Intimidation
Genius Mutagen: Consuming a cognitive mutagen adds its bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, Medicine, Nature, Performance, Religion, and Survival checks and allows R60' telepathic communication
Glib Mutagen: Consuming a silvertongue mutagen negates Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance circumstance penalties and language barriers
Greater Merciful Elixir: May make an elixir of life that also gives a +31 counteract on a blinded, deafened, sickened, or slowed condition
Improbable Elixirs: May create elixirs that replicate the effects of 5 potions of up to level 9
Infused Reagents: May create 25 batches of infused reagents each day
Merciful Elixir: (F) May make an elixir of life that also gives a +31 counteract on a fear or paralyzing effect
Perfect Mutagen: Does not suffer drawbacks from consuming mutagens
Perpetual Infusions: May create 2 alchemical items of up to level 11 from research field without using infused reagents
Persistent Mutagen: May extend the duration of a mutagen until the next day 1/day
Potent Poisoner: +4 crafted poison DCs (+41 max)
Quick Alchemy: (1) May use batches of infused reagents to create 3 alchemical items of up to level 20 for 1 turn
Research Field: Using Advanced Alchemy creates 3 signature items from research field
Snare Crafting: May use Crafting to create snares; knows the formulas for 4 common snares
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (1 max); master) Class DC: Alchemist: 41 (intelligence; master)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: None Weapons: Bastard Sword (+28 1d8+4 S [2h d12]; strength; expert); Lesser Bottled Lightning (+28 1d6 E R60'; dexterity; expert); Mace (+28 1d6+4 B; strength; expert); Morningstar (+28 1d6+4 B/P; strength; expert); Spear (+28 1d6+4 P R20'; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Alchemical Expertise: Class Expert (Alchemist)
Alchemical Mastery: Class Master (Alchemist)
Alchemical Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Alchemical Bombs; Unarmed Attacks)
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Far Lobber: Bombs have 30' range
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Medium Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Uncanny Bombs: Thrown bombs have 60' range
Unconventional Expertise: Attack Expert (Bastard Sword)
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Bastard Sword as one category simpler
Weapon Proficiency (Temple Sword): Attack Trained (Temple Sword)
Weapon Proficiency (Warhammer): Attack Trained (Warhammer)
Bomber: May have a bomb splash affect only a single target
Calculated Splash: May increase the splash damage of bombs to 5 Hit Points
Debilitating Bomb: (F) May create bombs up to level 18 that also inflict dazzled, deafened, flat-footed, or -5 Speed (DC 41 Fort negates)
Directional Bombs: May restrict bomb splash to a 15' cone
Expanded Splash: May throw bombs to inflict +5 HP damage in a 10' radius
Exploitive Bomb: (F) May use Quick Alchemy to make a bomb up to level 18 that negates resistance 20
Feral Mutagen: Consuming a bestial mutagen gives claws and jaws the deadly d10 trait; may also increase AC penalty to -2 to increase claws and jaws damage by 1 die step
Field Discovery: Using Advanced Alchemy creates 3 alchemical items from research field
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 48 alchemical formulas
Greater Debilitating Bomb: May create bombs up to level 18 that also inflict clumsy 1, enfeebled 1, stupefied 1, or -10 Speed (DC 41 Fort negates)
Greater Field Discovery (Bomber): May increase bomb splash to 10'
Greater Field Discovery (Chirurgeon): Elixirs restore the maximum number of Hit Points
Greater Field Discovery (Mutagenist): May use 2 polymorphic mutagens simultaneously
Invincible Mutagen: Consuming a juggernaut elixir gives resistance 5 to all physical damage
Mega Bomb: (1) May throw a bomb up to 60' that affects all creatures in a 30' radius (Ref negates)
Miracle Worker: May administer a true elixir of life to restore life to a creature dead for up to 2 rd
Mutagenic Flashback: (F) May regain the effects of a mutagen consumed earlier in the day for 1 min 1/day
Perfect Debilitation: Debilitating Bombs require a critical success to avoid effects
Powerful Alchemy: Items created with Quick Alchemy have DC 41
Quick Bomber: (1) May draw and throw a bomb
Revivifying Mutagen: May use 1 action to end mutagen effects and regain 1d6 Hit Points per 2 levels of the mutagen
Smoke Bomb: (F) May use Quick Alchemy to create a bomb up to level 19 that also creates smoke in a 10'-radius burst for 1 min
Sticky Bomb: (F) May create bombs up to level 18 that inflict persistent damage equal to splash damage
True Debilitating Bomb: May create bombs up to level 18 that also inflict enfeebled 2, stupefied 2, or -15 Speed (DC 41 Fort negates) or a lesser condition that requires a critical success to negate
Uncanny Bombs: Thrown bombs reduce target cover AC bonus by 1 and automatically succeed on the flat check to target a concealed creature
Weapon Specialization: +2/+3/+4 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Iron Will: Save Expert (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Mindblank Mutagen: Consuming a serene mutagen gives immunity to detection, revelation, and scrying up to level 9
Poison Resistance: Has poison resistance 10/+1 saves vs. poison
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Notes
Validation Errors:
Alchemist Research Field Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 37 allocated
